page.title: 16Panfield Community Assoc.
page.content: {Panfield School}closed in 1960 and the building became a{Community {Centre.}Over the years it has been used by the church, local council and private people for children's parties, etc. There are 14 different organisations using the hall now. Hire rates, which pay for heating and upkeep, vary according to times and length of hire. The{Playgroup}meet on Tuesday and Wednesday mornings. Thursdays there is {Toddlers Club}and{Keepfit}on Friday afternoons.In the evenings on Mondays there is{Brownies. Cubs}and{Scouts}on Tuesdays and on Fridays{Ballet {Classes.}Several groups have monthly meetings. These include the{Parish {Council, Community Assoc., Youth Club and the{After 8 Ladies Club. Bingo}is held once a fortnight.
